prefuse.util.display
Interface ItemBoundsListener

public interface ItemBoundsListener

Listener interface for monitoring changes to the space occupied by VisualItems within the space of a Display.

Author:
jeffrey heer

Method Summary
 void itemBoundsChanged(Display d)
          Signals a change in the total bounds occupied by VisualItems in a particular Display.
 

Method Detail

itemBoundsChanged

void itemBoundsChanged(Display d)
Signals a change in the total bounds occupied by VisualItems in a particular Display.

Parameters:
d - the Display whose item bounds has changed
